attributes.action: Alexander Boris de Pfeffel Johnson to be banned from holding any public office.
attributes.background: The person in question has made racist, Islamophobic, deliberately misleading and completely untrue comments as a public figure. I believe it is in the national interest to ensure public figures are accountable for their words. After all their words can influence the decisions of millions.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments. This includes calling for MPs and Ministers being fired or prevented from holding office.
